entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow or periods of drizzle ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over exposed areas. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023
